STORY_INTRO.message: This is the start of the story. Press start to begin.

responses.text: Don't tell me what to do.

GAME_INTRO.message: This is the start of the story. Please enter game code.

onestart.message: While living your own life is a choice that we each make, making a difference in someone else's isn't. You see a coworker. What do you do?

1goodending.message: How are you doing? Hope you have a wonderful day! And they did. NEW GAMECODE=2

1bad ending.message: You didn't say anything. And it would remain that way. NEW GAMECODE=3

1badending.message: You didn't say anything. And it would remain that way. NEW GAMECODE=3

twostart.message: In this game, you would play as the befriended coworker

threestart.message: In this game, you would play as the ignored, lonely coworker

ENTER_ROOM.message: You enter a room. What do you do?

responses.text: Don't tell me what to do.

SIT_DOWN.message: You sat down on a pile of spikes. You die. Press start to try again

responses.text: Don't tell me what to do.

WALK_OUT.message: You walked out of the spiky room into a hallway. There is a mailbox here.

GOOD_END.message: You opened the mailbox and found a dollar. Congratulations! Press start to try again.

responses.text: Don't tell me what to do.

BAD_END.message: You keep walking away from adventure, and miss out on a lifetime of excitement. Press start to try again.

responses.text: Don't tell me what to do.
